participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and expressive, always seeking the spotlight and enjoys a glamorous lifestyle.
participant_1.background: I'm high maintenance. I love listening to Britney Spears. I like to tan in tanning beds. I love spending money. I diet a lot.

participant_2.name: Jacob
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, loves exploring new cultures and cuisines, but can be a bit shy in social situations.
participant_2.background: I own a yacht and I rent it out when I am not using it. I've been traveling the world for a year. I also like to cook but I am not very good at it. I've been trying all types of food everywhere I go.
